subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Felipe Massa became the winner of the Belgian Grand Prix after Lewis Hamilton was penalized for cutting a corner in a late duel with the world champion Kimi Raikkonen on Sunday in Spa-Francorchamps. Hamilton, of McLaren, crossed the line 14.4 seconds ahead of Ferrari’s Massa during a finish in which Raikkonen crashed into a barrier, but Hamilton was penalized 25 seconds for an illegal maneuver.
